title: James and the Giant Peach
author: roald-dahl
summary: Orphaned James escapes his cruel aunts by travelling inside a giant peach with anthropomorphic insects. Dahl's first major children's book established his reputation as a beloved author of fantastical stories.

images.alt: James and the Giant Peach cover

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description:
***Roald Dahl's first and most widely celebrated book for young people continues to thrill readers around the world.***

**When James accidentally drops some magic crystals by the old peach tree, strange things start to happen.** The peach at the top of the tree begins to grow, and before long it's as big as a house. When James discovers a secret entrance-way into the fruit and crawls inside, he meets wonderful new friends--the Old-Green-Grasshopper, the dainty Ladybug, and the Centipede of th...
